headline: UnitedHealth (UNH): Buy, Sell, or Hold Post Q3 Earnings?
summary: UnitedHealth has followed the market’s trajectory closely, rising in tandem with the S&P 500 over the past six months. The stock has climbed by 14.5% to $344.03 per share while the index has gained 10.4%.
